locuslabs_account.title: LocusLabs Account
locuslabs_account.description: The LocusLabs Account associated with the ticket requester.
locuslabs_account.raw_description: The LocusLabs Account associated with the ticket requester.

venue_identifier.title: Venue Identifier
venue_identifier.description: LocusLabs venue id associating a venue with this ticket.
venue_identifier.raw_description: LocusLabs venue id associating a venue with this ticket.
venue_identifier.agent_description: Venue Identifiers generally match an Airport IATA Code format.

geohash.title: Geohash
geohash.description: A geohash associating a geographic location with a ticket.
geohash.raw_description: A geohash associating a geographic location with a ticket.

building_identifier.title: Building Identifier
building_identifier.description: LocusLabs building id associating a venue building with this ticket.
building_identifier.raw_description: LocusLabs building id associating a venue building with a ticket.

floor_identifier.title: Floor Identifier
floor_identifier.description: LocusLabs floor id associating a venue floor with a ticket.
floor_identifier.raw_description: LocusLabs floor id associating a venue floor with a ticket.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: A latitude associating a latitudinal plane with a ticket.
latitude.raw_description: A latitude associating a latitudinal plane with a ticket.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: A longitude associating a longitudinal plane with a ticket.
longitude.raw_description: A longitude associating a longitudinal plane with a ticket.

ordinal.title: Ordinal
ordinal.description: LocusLabs building orginal associating a collection of venue floors with a ticket.
ordinal.raw_description: LocusLabs building orginal associating a collection of venue floors with a ticket.
